data.text:
@CDPHE Letter to Anonymous:

https://t.co/l6gS9Asu2b

Add me, I'm real and need to see clear. 

#Anonymous
.
.
.
.
Maslow will not be proved wrong in the eyes of history the way that will will be if we do not adequately address the crises that face all of our people together.

@CDPHE and why is this so important. . . ? 
no treatment recommended other that stay home. . . 

People with the IQ of a carrot are smart enough to know this. . . 

Such a waste of manpower, & tax dollars

Oh, Were these tests made in China ?

@CDPHE Yeah but we just heard we'll show willenske basically saying they didn't know how the shot was going to work and then they see that it didn't do what they were hoping. And science direct came out with the study saying I vermented decrease mortality and covid-19 patients! Liars
@CDPHE Zzzzzzz. Tested positive a while ago and just isolated myself for five days. All good and the standard of care now
@CDPHE This is nothing to be proud of @cdphe @GovofCO - pushing any medical tests without reason (no symptoms) is medical malpractice and a lie to Coloradoans. What dumbasses. Your. Game. Is. Over.
